title: Client stopped working cannot launch anymore. error unsupported 16-bit application
body:
I just opened my league of legends like any other day. And somehow this pops up and I cant do anything about it. I tried to delete and reinstall and somehow this still pops up. 

The program or feature cannot start or run due to incompatibility with 64-bit version of windows.

replies.body: Are you on a Windows OS running as 32 or 64-bit?  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case, and our tech team can dig into this with you.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well if possible to obtain some logs, and attach it to your ticket for context.  We'll see you there!
